price: Kuma haƙĩƙa, Munã zaunar da ku ga ƙasa a bãyansu. Wancan ne abin gargaɗi ga wanda ya ji tsõron matsayiNa, kuma ya ji tsõron ƙyacẽwãTa.
arabic: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walanus'kinannakumu al-arḍa min baʿdihim dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa waʿīdi
translations: And surely We will make you dwell
